results.abstract: NASA's Advanced Space Propulsion Laboratory and MSE Technology Applications collaborate on new type of rocket engine, called Vasimir, that uses radio waves to heat fuel and magnetic fields to direct stream of ultrahot ionized gases; Dr Franklin Chang-Diaz, laboratory director, holds engine could halve travel time between Earth and Mars; photo (M)

headline.main: Novel Rockets Speed Dreams of Sending People to Mars

results.snippet: A new type of rocket engine under development could halve the travel time between Earth and Mars -- should NASA ever decide to send astronauts there.    ''I think it's the technology that's going to take us to Mars,'' said Dr. Franklin Chang-Diaz, a...
results.lead_paragraph: A new type of rocket engine under development could halve the travel time between Earth and Mars -- should NASA ever decide to send astronauts there. ''I think it's the technology that's going to take us to Mars,'' said Dr. Franklin Chang-Diaz, a shuttle astronaut and director of the Advanced Space Propulsion Laboratory at the Johnson Space Center in Houston.

results.abstract: Frosty Bites are ice cream nuggets the size of peppercorns; photo (S)

headline.main: What Have They Done To My Ice Cream Now?

results.snippet: When I first tasted Frosty Bites at Sassy's Sliders, 1530 Third Avenue (86th Street), they reminded me of the nuggets of freeze-dried astronaut ice cream that every parent who takes children to the Smithsonian's National Air and Space Museum in...
results.lead_paragraph: When I first tasted Frosty Bites at Sassy's Sliders, 1530 Third Avenue (86th Street), they reminded me of the nuggets of freeze-dried astronaut ice cream that every parent who takes children to the Smithsonian's National Air and Space Museum in Washington feels compelled to buy. Frosty Bites, ice cream bits the size of peppercorns, do have a futuristic quality, but they taste a lot better than freeze-dried. They are served in a cup, and you spoon them up like breakfast cereal. The sensation is a little odd, since they lack the softly melting surface of a scoop of ice cream. I can't imagine a rippled flavor like vanilla-fudge or caramel swirl being satisfying in this form, but for crunchy Oreo cookie it's just fine. Frosty Bites are $3.25 a portion and also come in vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, mint-chocolate and rainbow sorbet. Mixing's allowed.
